extracted_metadata.title: English Video-04: The Geography of Occupation - Dr. Salman Abu Sitta
extracted_metadata.description: Salman Abu Sitta: The Geography of Occupation. The story of al Nakba ethnic cleansing of 1948 by one of its survivors, the distinguished writer and researcher Salman Abu Sitta.
